schema.name: Cumul Exercice A-1 (Quantité en UV BL)
Cumul Exercice A-1 (Quantité en UV BL)

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Fournisseur as string,
		{Coopérative} as string,
		{Référence} as string,
		{Désignation} as string,
		Mois as string,
		{CA 2020} as string,
		{CA 2019} as string,
		{Qte 2020} as string,
		{Qte 2019} as string,
		path as string,
		qte_ecoulement as string,
		Famille as string,
		{Sous Famille} as string,
		REFFOURNISSEUR as string,
		{Qte Livrée 2020} as string,
		{Qte Livrée 2019} as string,
		{Code Dispo Cde} as string,
		{Code SAPAIG} as string,
		{CA sans Marge} as string,
		{CA sans Marge A-1} as string,
		{Evol. CA A/A-1} as string,
		{Qte Livrée} as string,
		{Qte Livrée A-1} as string,
		{Evol. Qte A/A-1} as string,
		{Qté Livrée 2020} as string,
		{Qté Livrée 2019} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ecoulement
source(output(
		{Nom Coopérative} as string,
		{CP Coop.} as string,
		POSSAMid as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		BrandID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> organisation
getYearmonth derive(month = iif(lower(Mois)=="janvier", "01",      iif(lower(Mois)=="février","02",     iif(lower(Mois)=="mars", "03",      iif(lower(Mois)=="avril", "04",      iif(lower(Mois)=="mai", "05",      iif(lower(Mois)=="juin", "06",      iif(lower(Mois)=="juillet", "07",      iif(lower(Mois)=="août", "08",      iif(lower(Mois)=="septembre", "09",      iif(lower(Mois)=="octobre", "10",      iif(lower(Mois)=="novembre", "11",      iif(lower(Mois)=="décembre", "12", "0")))))))))))),
		qte_ecoulement = toDouble(qte_ecoulement)) ~> monthToNumber
yearmonth filter(!isNull(qte_ecoulement)) ~> quantityNotNull
monthToNumber filter(isNull(qte_ecoulement)) ~> quantityNull
quantityNotNull filter(!isNull({Coopérative})) ~> cooperativenotNull
organisation filter(!isNull({Nom Coopérative})) ~> orgaCooperativeNotNull
orgaCooperativeNotNull aggregate(groupBy({Nom Coopérative},
		HubSAPid),
	POSSAMid = max(POSSAMid)) ~> unique
cooperativenotNull, unique join({Coopérative} == {Nom Coopérative},
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> innerOrganisation
cooperativenotNull, unique join({Coopérative} == {Nom Coopérative},
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> leftOrganisation
leftOrganisation filter(isNull({Nom Coopérative})) ~> leftOuter
monthToNumber derive(yearmonth = year+month,
		qte_ecoulement = toDouble(qte_ecoulement)) ~> yearmonth
innerOrganisation select(mapColumn(
		marque_file,
		{Coopérative},
		{Référence},
		{Désignation},
		Mois,
		path,
		qte_ecoulement,
		REFFOURNISSEUR,
		year,
		month,
		yearmonth,
		{Nom Coopérative},
		HubSAPid,
		POSSAMid
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select3
Select3 select(mapColumn(
		marque_file,
		{Coopérative},
		{Référence},
		{Désignation},
		Mois,
		path,
		qte_ecoulement,
		REFFOURNISSEUR,
		year,
		month,
		yearmonth,
		{Nom Coopérative},
		HubSAPid,
		POSSAMid
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select4
Select4 derive(year = substring(yearmonth,1,4),
		marque_id = iif(lower(marque_file)=="vaillant", 1621, 1604)) ~> typeCaste
typeCaste select(mapColumn(
		marque_file,
		reference = {Référence},
		article = {Désignation},
		qte_ecoulement,
		year,
		month,
		yearmonth,
		HubSAPid,
		POSSAMid,
		marque_id
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> uniformisation
ecoulement select(mapColumn(
		marque_file = Fournisseur,
		{Coopérative},
		{Référence},
		{Désignation},
		Mois,
		path,
		qte_ecoulement,
		REFFOURNISSEUR
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> columnChoice
columnChoice derive(year = replace(split(path, " ")[5], ".xlsx", ""),
		month = split(path, " ")[4]) ~> getYearmonth
uniformisation sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		{Région Statistique} as string,
		Enseigne as string,
		{Marque DESC} as string,
		{Marque Code} as string,
		{Sous Famille} as string,
		{Référence Article Fournisseur} as string,
		{Article National DESC} as string,
		{Article National Code} as string,
		{Agence Code} as string,
		{Agence DESC} as string,
		{Département DESC} as string,
		{Département ID} as string,
		Secteur as string,
		{Quantité en UV BL} as string,
		{Année Précédente (Quantité en UV BL)} as string,
		{Cumul Exercice (Quantité en UV BL)} as string,
		{Cumul Exercice A-1 (Quantité en UV BL)} as string,
		{MOIS CA PRR N} as string,
		{MOIS CA PRR N-1} as string,
		{CA PRR au cumul} as string,
		{CA PRR au cumul N-1} as string,
		fileName as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['ORCAB_ECOUL_PREPARED.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> OUTPUT
quantityNull sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['ORCAB_QTE_NULL.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> quantityNullOutput
leftOuter sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['ORCAB_ORGANISATION_NOTFOUND.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> organisationNotFound

source(output(
		{Code postal} as string,
		marque_file as string,
		article as string,
		ca_ecoulement as string,
		{ReprÃ©sentant} as string,
		departement_id as string,
		reference as string,
		qte_ecoulement as string,
		yearmonth as string,
		year as string,
		month as string,
		UnitID as string,
		County as string,
		POSSAMidString as string,
		marque_id as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		distributeur as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> vfconfortPrepared
source(output(
		marque_file as string,
		agence_code as string,
		article as string,
		reference as string,
		qte_ecoulement as string,
		yearmonth as string,
		month as string,
		year as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		WholeSalerShortName as string,
		UnitID as string,
		POSdescription as string,
		County as string,
		POSSAMidString as string,
		marque_id as string,
		HubName as string,
		distributeur as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> mabillePrepared
source(output(
		marque_file as string,
		reference as string,
		article as string,
		qte_ecoulement as string,
		year as string,
		month as string,
		yearmonth as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		POSSAMid as string,
		marque_id as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> orcabPrepared
source(output(
		distributeur as string,
		agence_code as string,
		marque_file as string,
		reference as string,
		qte_ecoulement as string,
		yearmonth as string,
		canal as string,
		year as string,
		month as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		County as string,
		POSSAMid as string,
		marque_id as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> tereva
source(output(
		marque_file as string,
		sous_famille as string,
		reference as string,
		agence_code as string,
		departement_id as string,
		qte_ecoulement as string,
		yearmonth as string,
		POSSAMidString as string,
		marque_id as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		year as string,
		month as string,
		distributeur as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> DSC
source(output(
		distributeur as string,
		reference as string,
		article as string,
		qte_ecoulement as string,
		ca_ecoulement as string,
		{Code postal} as string,
		year as string,
		month as string,
		yearmonth as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		POSSAMid as string,
		marque_id as string,
		marque_file as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> maillard
source(output(
		marque_file as string,
		agence_code as string,
		{Code postal} as string,
		reference as string,
		qte_ecoulement as string,
		yearmonth as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		WholeSalerShortName as string,
		UnitID as string,
		POSdescription as string,
		County as string,
		POSSAMidString as string,
		marque_id as string,
		year as string,
		month as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Partedis
source(output(
		marque_file as string,
		{Région} as string,
		{Nom Agence} as string,
		agence_code as string,
		{Département} as string,
		{Référence Article} as string,
		{Description Article} as string,
		{Catégorie Achat} as string,
		qte_ecoulement as string,
		str_mois as string,
		year as string,
		{Gestion entrepôt} as string,
		{Marques/ Constructeur} as string,
		month as string,
		yearmonth as string,
		{CP Coop.} as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		{Nom Coopérative} as string,
		POSSAMidString as string,
		BrandID as string,
		Dept as string,
		{Code postal} as string,
		Article as string,
		{Code client} as string,
		{Qté vente directe} as string,
		reference as string,
		distributeur as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> EHS
vfconfortPrepared, mabillePrepared union(byName: true)~> Union1
Union1, sOrcab union(byName: true)~> Union2
tereva select(mapColumn(
		distributeur,
		agence_code,
		marque_file,
		reference,
		qte_ecoulement,
		yearmonth,
		canal,
		year,
		month,
		HubSAPid,
		County,
		POSSAMidString = POSSAMid,
		marque_id
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sTereva
DerivedColumn3 select(mapColumn(
		marque_file,
		sous_famille,
		reference,
		agence_code,
		departement_id,
		qte_ecoulement,
		year,
		month,
		yearmonth,
		POSSAMidString,
		marque_id,
		HubSAPid,
		distributeur
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sDSC
maillard select(mapColumn(
		distributeur,
		reference,
		article,
		qte_ecoulement,
		ca_ecoulement,
		{Code postal},
		year,
		month,
		yearmonth,
		HubSAPid,
		POSSAMidString = POSSAMid,
		marque_id,
		marque_file
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sMaillard
DerivedColumn1 select(mapColumn(
		marque_file,
		reference,
		article,
		qte_ecoulement,
		year,
		month,
		yearmonth,
		HubSAPid,
		POSSAMidString = POSSAMid,
		marque_id,
		distributeur
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sOrcab
Union2, sTereva union(byName: true)~> Union3
Union3, sDSC union(byName: true)~> Union4
Union4, sMaillard union(byName: true)~> Union5
UnionEHS select(mapColumn(
		{Code postal},
		marque_file,
		ca_ecoulement,
		reference,
		qte_ecoulement,
		yearmonth,
		year,
		month,
		POSSAMidString,
		marque_id,
		HubSAPid,
		distributeur,
		agence_code
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
orcabPrepared derive(distributeur = "orcab") ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn2 select(mapColumn(
		marque_file,
		agence_code,
		{Code postal},
		reference,
		qte_ecoulement,
		yearmonth,
		HubSAPid,
		POSSAMidString,
		marque_id,
		year,
		month,
		distributeur
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sPartedis
Partedis derive(distributeur = "partedis") ~> DerivedColumn2
Union5, sPartedis union(byName: true)~> unionPartedis
DSC derive(distributeur = "DSC") ~> DerivedColumn3
unionPartedis, sEHS union(byName: true)~> UnionEHS
EHS select(mapColumn(
		marque_file,
		agence_code,
		qte_ecoulement,
		year,
		month,
		yearmonth,
		HubSAPid,
		POSSAMidString,
		marque_id = BrandID,
		{Code postal},
		Article,
		reference,
		distributeur
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sEHS
Select1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		{Région Statistique} as string,
		Enseigne as string,
		{Marque DESC} as string,
		{Marque Code} as string,
		{Sous Famille} as string,
		{Référence Article Fournisseur} as string,
		{Article National DESC} as string,
		{Article National Code} as string,
		{Agence Code} as string,
		{Agence DESC} as string,
		{Département DESC} as string,
		{Département ID} as string,
		Secteur as string,
		{Quantité en UV BL} as string,
		{Année Précédente (Quantité en UV BL)} as string,
		{Cumul Exercice (Quantité en UV BL)} as string,
		{Cumul Exercice A-1 (Quantité en UV BL)} as string,
		{MOIS CA PRR N} as string,
		{MOIS CA PRR N-1} as string,
		{CA PRR au cumul} as string,
		{CA PRR au cumul N-1} as string,
		fileName as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['allDistruUnioned.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1

transformations.name: MapDrifted1
transformations.description: Creates an explicit mapping for each drifted column

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{Représentant} as string,
		{N° Département} as string,
		{Département} as string,
		{Code point de vente} as string,
		{Libellé point de vente} as string,
		{Code Depot source} as string,
		{Code client} as string,
		Client as string,
		{N° Siret} as string,
		{Code postal} as string,
		Ville as string,
		{Année livraison} as string,
		{Mois livraison} as string,
		{code fournisseur} as string,
		{fournisseur principal} as string,
		{Code produit} as string,
		produit as string,
		{Réference} as string,
		{Qte en unité de vente} as string,
		{Montant prv net} as string,
		path as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ecoulement
source(output(
		WholeSalerID as string,
		WholeSalerShortName as string,
		UnitID as string,
		POSid as string,
		POSdescription as string,
		County as string,
		POSSAMid as string,
		POSSAMidString as string,
		SupplierID as string,
		BrandID as string,
		WholeSalerHubID as string,
		HubName as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		SectorID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> organisation
source(output(
		yearmonth as string,
		Article as string,
		{Code client} as string,
		{Qt� vente directe} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ventesDirectes
Select1 derive(yearmonth = regexExtract(fileName , '(\\d+)'),
		qte_ecoulement = toDouble(qte_ecoulement)) ~> yearmonth
yearmonth derive(year = substring(yearmonth, 1, 4),
		month = substring(yearmonth, 5 ,2)) ~> yearAndMonth
yearAndMonth filter(isNull(qte_ecoulement)) ~> quantityNull
yearAndMonth filter(!isNull(qte_ecoulement)) ~> quantityNotNull
ecoulement derive({Représentant} = toString(byName('Représentant')),
		{N° Département} = toString(byName('N° Département')),
		{Département} = toString(byName('Département')),
		{Libellé point de vente} = toString(byName('Libellé point de vente')),
		{N° Siret} = toString(byName('N° Siret')),
		{Année livraison} = toString(byName('Année livraison')),
		{Réference} = toString(byName('Réference')),
		{Qte en unité de vente} = toString(byName('Qte en unité de vente'))) ~> MapDrifted1
MapDrifted1 select(mapColumn(
		{Code point de vente},
		{Code Depot source},
		{Code client},
		Client,
		{Code postal},
		Ville,
		{Mois livraison},
		{code fournisseur},
		{fournisseur principal},
		{Code produit},
		produit,
		{Montant prv net},
		{Représentant},
		{N° Département},
		{Département},
		{Libellé point de vente},
		{N° Siret},
		{Année livraison},
		{Réference},
		qte_ecoulement = {Qte en unité de vente},
		fileName = path
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
quantityNotNull filter(!isNull({Code point de vente})) ~> codePointVenteNotNull
organisation derive(POSid = trim(POSid, " "),
		HubSAPid = trim(HubSAPid, " ")) ~> cleansing
cleansing filter(!isNull(POSid)) ~> posidNotNull
posidNotNull aggregate(groupBy(POSid,
		HubSAPid),
	WholeSalerID = max(WholeSalerID),
		WholeSalerShortName = max(WholeSalerShortName),
		UnitID = max(UnitID),
		POSdescription = max(POSdescription),
		County = max(County),
		POSSAMid = max(POSSAMid),
		POSSAMidString = max(POSSAMidString),
		SupplierID = max(SupplierID),
		BrandID = max(BrandID),
		WholeSalerHubID = max(WholeSalerHubID),
		HubName = max(HubName),
		SectorID = max(SectorID)) ~> uniqueOrganisation
codePointVenteNotNull, organisation join({Code point de vente} == POSid,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> innerOrganisation
ventesDirectes select(mapColumn(
		yearmonth_right = yearmonth,
		Article,
		{Code client_right} = {Code client},
		{Qté ventes directes} = {Qt� vente directe}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RenameVentesDirectes
innerOrganisation, RenameVentesDirectes join(yearmonth == yearmonth_right
	&& {Réference} == Article
	&& POSSAMid == {Code client_right},
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> innerVentesDirectes
innerOrganisation, RenameVentesDirectes join(yearmonth == yearmonth_right
	&& {Réference} == Article
	&& POSSAMid == {Code client_right},
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> leftVentesDirectes
innerVentesDirectes derive(qte_ecoulement = qte_ecoulement-toDouble({Qté ventes directes})) ~> enleverVentesDirectes
leftVentesDirectes filter(isNull(yearmonth) || isNull(Article) || isNull({Code client_right})) ~> outerleftVentesDirectes
Addcolumn select(mapColumn(
		{Code postal},
		marque_file = {fournisseur principal},
		article = produit,
		ca_ecoulement = {Montant prv net},
		{Représentant},
		departement_id = {N° Département},
		reference = {Réference},
		qte_ecoulement,
		yearmonth,
		year,
		month,
		UnitID,
		County,
		POSSAMidString,
		marque_id = BrandID,
		HubSAPid,
		distributeur
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> uniformisation
enleverVentesDirectes, outerleftVentesDirectes union(byName: true)~> Union1
Union1 derive(canal = '',
		distributeur = "vf_confort") ~> Addcolumn
codePointVenteNotNull, organisation join({Code point de vente} == POSid,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 filter(isNull(POSid)) ~> Filter1
quantityNull sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['VFCONFORT_QTE_NULL.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> outputQuantityNull
uniformisation sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		{Région Statistique} as string,
		Enseigne as string,
		{Marque DESC} as string,
		{Marque Code} as string,
		{Sous Famille} as string,
		{Référence Article Fournisseur} as string,
		{Article National DESC} as string,
		{Article National Code} as string,
		{Agence Code} as string,
		{Agence DESC} as string,
		{Département DESC} as string,
		{Département ID} as string,
		Secteur as string,
		{Quantité en UV BL} as string,
		{Année Précédente (Quantité en UV BL)} as string,
		{Cumul Exercice (Quantité en UV BL)} as string,
		{Cumul Exercice A-1 (Quantité en UV BL)} as string,
		{MOIS CA PRR N} as string,
		{MOIS CA PRR N-1} as string,
		{CA PRR au cumul} as string,
		{CA PRR au cumul N-1} as string,
		fileName as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['VFCONFORT_ECOUL_PREPARED.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> output
Filter1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		{Marque DESC} as string,
		{Marque Code} as string,
		{Sous Famille} as string,
		{Référence Article Fournisseur} as string,
		{Agence Code} as string,
		{Département ID} as string,
		{Quantité en UV BL} as string,
		yearmonth as string,
		year as string,
		month as string,
		POSid as string,
		WholeSalerID as string,
		POSSAMidString as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		BrandID as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['VFCONFORT_ORGANISATION_NOTFOUND.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> VFCONFORTORGANISATIONNOTFOUND
